title: Whenever I'm asking when my Jungler intends to gank my lane

replies.body:
http://24.media.tumblr.com/fee0ea9393af4be803b8c674eebeb404/tumblr_mgn4eykNCV1reats2o1_500.gif

Give me time to finish blowing these bubbles, I'll get to you then.
OK, I gotta know, have you played the game or do you just have that gif?
I have played through it. but it's been a while. good games those mystery dungeons are.
I have a minor obsession with them >.>

I'm a one playthrough kinda guy, But I can appreciate fine craftsmanship when I see it.
Imma guess that the sun/moon starter you like is litten.
How would you ever be able to guess that? O.o Are you a magician?
I went to a mechanical fortune teller and it gave me a card that said your favorite sun/moon starter was litten.
gimme their address. and yes i want a pmd game with the new region starters

The fortune teller is underneath the truck next to the SS Anne. If you use the abra glitch from yellow while using strength it'll pop out and tell you something that might be relevant.

Also, I want a new pmd that uses old pmd style with sprites instead of 3d models.
i remember playing pmd eos with pikachu and evee. fun times
Nostalgia goggles on. good times those, good times. I miss the sprite style some days. was pretty iconic.
I prefer the old games to the new ones. Not just the sprites, even that quiz was pretty iconic to the games until they removed it in gates to infinity.

The story in EOS was litterally one of the best RPGs I ever played.

I even cried for this game, twice!

http://files.enjin.com.s3.amazonaws.com/426315/modules/forum/attachments/Feeljunk%2Bi%2Bgot%2Bhit%2Bby%2Bthe%2Bfeel%2Bright%2Bin%2Bthe_7c0559_4269745_1435401692.jpg

i didn't really like the mystery dungeon games after the first ones. I felt like they railroaded you way too much (ie forced you to use your first form starters FOR THE WHOLE DAMN GAME) and also I hated the idea of " pokemon pay big but you get a tiny cut of it because f you"

also, there don't seem to be any branching storylines like how you could in red/blue like say pursuing Gengar's wish or collecting the Legendary Birds or the Latios subplot or the Rainbow Wing subplot

and I really enjoyed the "finding homes for your pokemon partners" aspect of the first games, and I missed being able to go and visit different places.
Wish gamefreak would just make more of those. that would be good enough.
that ending really hit the spot
Which mystery dungeon is it?
eos, if memory serves

when you don't play morde

which means never :^) oh wait you play skarner now my bad {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Don't say his name or he'll find you and then come after me and he'll block all my damage and *shudders*
"I'm not being pushy...**but**"
Usually for me it's like. "When you aren't pushing in the lane i'm Master Yi I ain't turret diving that animal."

Mordekaiser
Not Pushing

Pick one
You can turn off the push with morde. you just need to go full ham to do it.
mrw a jungler pings omw a few times and then doesn't show up for 3 minutes

When they ping omw and you see their icon on the minimap so you use your CC and engage

But it turns out they're just getting scuttle and leave right after and you die
Gank? AHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAAA... Seriously though...

If you, Malicious Metal, added me and played with me, and me being jungle, and ask me when I intend to gank, I will suddenly gain short-term memory loss and forget why I am at the camp I am at, then get the sudden urge to come gank for you
